trans-unit.source: Grant Full Disk Access to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> for macOS Catalina and Above

seg-source.mrk: Grant Full Disk Access to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> for macOS Catalina and Above

target.mrk: Accorder l'accès complet au disque pour <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sur les versions macOS Catalina et supérieur

trans-unit.source: MacOS Catalina and above versions include a new privacy policy that prevents applications from accessing various components of the system, including sensitive data sets. By default, applications such as <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> are prevented from accessing user data, such as mail or messages databases.

seg-source.mrk: MacOS Catalina and above versions include a new privacy policy that prevents applications from accessing various components of the system, including sensitive data sets.

By default, applications such as <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> are prevented from accessing user data, such as mail or messages databases.

target.mrk: Les versions MacOS Catalina et supérieures incluent une nouvelle politique de confidentialité qui empêche les applications d'accéder à divers composants du système, y compris les ensembles de données sensibles.

Par défaut, les applications telles que <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> ne peuvent accéder aux données utilisateur, telles que les bases de données de courrier ou de messages.

trans-unit.source: To provide complete protection for all system components, a Full Disk Access is required after:

seg-source.mrk: To provide complete protection for all system components, a Full Disk Access is required after:

target.mrk: Pour assurer une protection complète de tous les composants du système, un accès complet au disque est requis après :

seg-source.mrk: Installing the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: L'installation de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Upgrading with the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> already installed on your system.

seg-source.mrk: Upgrading with the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> already installed on your system.

target.mrk: La mise à jour de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> déjà installé sur votre système.

trans-unit.source: This is a one-time configuration. Once the Privacy settings are selected in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agt.elem" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, they are retained during upgrades of the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> package.

seg-source.mrk: This is a one-time configuration.

Once the Privacy settings are selected in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agt.elem" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, they are retained during upgrades of the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> package.

target.mrk: Il s'agit d'une configuration ponctuelle.

Une fois les paramètres de confidentialité sélectionnés dans le <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et le <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agt.elem" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, ils sont conservés lors des mises à niveau du paquet <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: To grant Full Disk Access

target.mrk: Pour accorder l'accès complet au disque

trans-unit.source: In the Apple menu, click System Preferences to access the Security & Privacy window.

seg-source.mrk: In the Apple menu, click System Preferences to access the Security & Privacy window.

target.mrk: Dans le menu Apple, cliquez sur Préférences système pour accéder à la fenêtre Sécurité et confidentialité.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Privacy tab.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur l'onglet Confidentialité.

trans-unit.source: Select Full Disk Access in the left menu.

seg-source.mrk: Select Full Disk Access in the left menu.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez Accès complet au disque dans le menu de gauche.

trans-unit.source: Click the lock at the bottom left of the pane to make changes and enter your credentials.

seg-source.mrk: Click the lock at the bottom left of the pane to make changes and enter your credentials.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur le verrou en bas à gauche du volet pour apporter des modifications et entrer vos identifiants.

seg-source.mrk: Click the + icon.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur le bouton +.

trans-unit.source: Open the element located in the finder under /library/Application Support/HN/base/bin.

seg-source.mrk: Open the element located in the finder under /library/Application Support/HN/base/bin.

target.mrk: Ouvrez l'élément situé dans le Finder sous /library/Application Support/HN/base/bin.

trans-unit.source: Repeat steps 5 and 6 for the located in /Applications/LiveNavigator.

seg-source.mrk: Repeat steps 5 and 6 for the located in /Applications/LiveNavigator.

target.mrk: Répétez les étapes 5 et 6 pour l' situé dans /Applications/LiveNavigator.

trans-unit.source: Both apps can access all system components when they are listed with the check mark (<MadCap:xref href="#HNagent_and_Live_Navigator_have_access" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Both apps can access all system components when they are listed with the check mark (<MadCap:xref href="#HNagent_and_Live_Navigator_have_access" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

target.mrk: Les deux applications peuvent accéder à tous les composants du système lorsqu'elles sont listées avec la coche (<MadCap:xref href="#HNagent_and_Live_Navigator_have_access" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agt.elem" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> have disk access

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agt.elem" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> have disk access

target.mrk: L'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agt.elem" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> ont accès au disque

trans-unit.source: Restart the system to restart the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agt.elem" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Restart the system to restart the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agt.elem" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Redémarrez le système pour redémarrer le <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agt.elem" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source:
You can also use the Terminal application to restart the , using the following commands:

$ sudo bash

Password:

bash-3.2# launchct1 unload /Library/LaunchDaemons/com.hnagent.plist

bash-3.2# launchct1 load /Library/launchDaemons/com.hnagent.plist

bash-3.2#

seg-source.mrk: You can also use the Terminal application to restart the , using the following commands:
$ sudo bash
Password:
bash-3.2# launchct1 unload /Library/LaunchDaemons/com.hnagent.plist
bash-3.2# launchct1 load /Library/launchDaemons/com.hnagent.plist
bash-3.2#

target.mrk: Vous pouvez également utiliser l'application Terminal pour redémarrer le , à l'aide des commandes suivantes :
$ sudo bash
Password:
bash-3.2# launchct1 unload /Library/LaunchDaemons/com.hnagent.plist
bash-3.2# launchct1 load /Library/launchDaemons/com.hnagent.plist
bash-3.2#

trans-unit.source: At this point, the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Agent is fully operational on your system.

seg-source.mrk: At this point, the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Agent is fully operational on your system.

target.mrk: À ce stade, l' agent <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> est pleinement opérationnel sur votre système.
